body:
try to use 3ds instead:
3ds2mgf model.3ds 
mgf2rad model.mgf > model.rad


or


export 3ds from autocad 
import is again in autocad 
use torad
(this procedure just to mesh model elements)


to refine the mesh use (in autocad)
FACETRES = 10






hope it works,
cheers
giulio
